m_szDocTitle: Boeing, SpaceX win contracts to build 'space taxis' for NASA | Reuters
m_szDocSumamry: Boeing, SpaceX win contracts to build 'space taxis' for NASA CAPE CANAVERAL/WASHINGTON | By Irene Klotz and Andrea Shalal NASA astronaut Randy Bresnik prepares to enter Boeing's CST-100 spacecraft for a fit check evaluation at the company's Houston Product Support Center in this undated image. NASA will partner with Boeing and SpaceX to build commercially owned and operated 'space taxis' to fly... Reuters/NASA/Handout via Reuters 1 of 4 right An interior view of Boeing's CST-100 spacecraft, which features LED lighting and tablet technology, is seen in an undated NASA handout image. Reuters/NAS
